subject: Re: FW: (Broker.com.au) Missing alt text: 173 URLs

full_threads.body: (will continue the onboarding click-up task and charge 8mins for admin time [putting this to pending since I can't charge the record yet)]

Hi Matt,

Thank you so much for confirming!

Just let me know if there’s anything else I can do, always happy to help.

Thanks, Allie. Lets leave these for now and see what impact your amends have over next few weeks.

Thanks

Matt

Matthew Board

Managing Director

Broker.com.au

Hey Matt,

Thanks for sharing across.

The Health Score of the site is good 98, and the recent SEO and PageSpeed improvements will support rankings and discoverability.

We can fix these items in the report if you'd like however would be 7 - 9 hours work to resolve all the issues (I've put line items below).

Given these are only warnings, we'd recommend leave it but let us know if you'd like us to proceed.

***

  • Missing alt text —> requires adding alt text to all images (likely 2-3 hours work)
  • Open Graph tags incomplete —> updating these is relatively simple (1-2 hours work)
  • Page and SERP titles do not match —> Not a major issue, can fix if you'd like (1-2 hours work)
  • Pages to submit to IndexNow —> we can look into these (<1 hour)
  • Multiple H1 tags —> found in our analysis too, should mostly be fixed
  • Indexable page not in sitemap —> we can look into these (<1 hour)
  • Page has only one dofollow incoming internal link —> we can look into these (<1 hour)

@allieB Proposed reply here.

—-

Hey Matt,

Thanks for sharing across.

The Health Score of the site is good 98, and the recent SEO and PageSpeed improvements will support rankings and discoverability.

We can fix these items in the report if you'd like however would be 7 - 9 hours work to resolve all the issues (I've put line items below).

GIving these are only warnings, we'd recommend leave it but let us know if you'd like us to proceed.

Thanks,
Allie

***

  • Missing alt text —> requires adding alt text to all images (likely 2-3 hours work)
  • Open Graph tags incomplete —> updating these is relatively simple (1-2 hours work)
  • Page and SERP titles do not match —> Not a major issue, can fix if you'd like (1-2 hours work)
  • Pages to submit to IndexNow —> we can look into these (<1 hour)

  • Indexable page not in sitemap —> we can look into these (<1 hour)
  • Page has only one dofollow incoming internal link —> we can look into these (<1 hour)

All good, thanks Allie. I'll wait until you've gone over it all.

Thanks

Matt

Hi Matt,

Just jumping in on behalf of Andy, thanks so much for passing this on!

We’ll run a full SEO audit on your site and take a good look at what Ben flagged in AHREFS.

Once we’ve reviewed everything, we’ll get back to you with a clear summary and any next steps we recommend.

If there’s anything specific you’d like us to focus on, just let me know, happy to dig into it.

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Allie Borcena

I hope all is well.


Ben is a good mate of mine, and he sent the below from AHREFS on our site. Its all Greek to me, but I thought it might be useful to send through to you and the team.


Thanks
Matt
